entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, and he is having a conversation with Malfoy.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend who is passing messages to him during the conversation.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a Death Eater and one of the antagonists in the story, he is having a conversation with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character mentioned in the conversation, it seems that he had told Harry about the prophecy but Harry didn't come earlier to get it.

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is Voldemort, a main antagonist in the story. He is mentioned as trying to use others to steal the prophecy for him.

relationships.description: Harry knew about the prophecy from Dumbledore, but he didn't come earlier to get it.
Malfoy is questioning Harry about why he didn't come earlier to get the prophecy.
The Dark Lord tried to use others to steal the prophecy for him, but it was not successful.
